Text: It's not the extended version, am I right?
Everyone is waiting for the extended cut, if someone could verify wether this is it or not would be great, thanks.

@There is no extended cut.  Like the Avengers, the extra are uploaded separately.  If you want the extras, here's the torrent: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7681459/Prometheus.2012.EXTRAS.720p.BluRay.x264-PublicHD
Thanks Efreak. Didn't know about Avengers extras either.
BOZX, what is the difference between this one and your other Prometheus - the 3.4 GB one, other than the DTS audio? The resolution and source seems to be the same?

@topk
The other source was directly from itunes.  This one is directly from the retail blueray so it has much better audio, and maybe a little better video.

Amazing movie. I just finished watching it, no idea why some people were disappointed with it. I guess they were expecting to see an action or horror movie with aliens chasing people? Great science-fiction movie, totally fascinating.

Thanks for the upload!  A10/V10/M6

@Leto - To answer your question/comment, rather than start a diatribe listing all of the ridiculously unrealistic actions of the crew in this movie, I would just suggest you read some of the comments on IMDB.  This is one of those movies that had a lot more potential than it actually delivered, primarily due to a poor script.  It's tempting to want to list some of the absurdities but I'll restrain myself.

lol? why would I need to read the imdb comments? why should I care about other people's opinion? I certainly don't need someone else to tell me whether a movie is good or not. I enjoyed this movie, that's the only thing that matters.
Just finished downloading thanks :) idk about the movie but the AMIABLE releases never go wrong
Thanks, finally a PROPER 1080p version. I wonder why others insist on trying to fool the others with 720p upscaled to 1080p.
damn, ignore my last comment, wrong title

Finally watched it, great quality as always for an AMIABLE release, and the movie is fine, i really don't see why some people say it's a shitty movie, i liked it more than avengers for sure.

although i recommend you to download the 1080p version, this one worth watching it in great quality.
